review: Works perfectly with my prime membership...Love it.
author: Margaret Martins

review: Bought this for my husband and he loves it. He can find things he's interested in at any time as this convenience.
author: KATHRYN SANDERS

review: Quit working in 2 weeks.  It worked during the first two weeks and then it started showing network connection problem whenever I wanted to watch Netflix.  Contact Amazon for return and the customer service transferred me to Fire TV department and they convinced me to try it again with a replacement part.  Well, the Fire TV worked for another few weeks after the new part arrived and then quit working again.  The same issue.  It doesn't seem to support or encourage Netflix.  Very disappointed.
author: DC

review: Love it. Easy to install and easy t o use.
author: Matt Hopkins

review: I liked it at first, but now it rarely works and can't even watch shows/movies anymore. I'm having to resort back to my computer, which is aggravating because the only reason I purchased it was to free up my computer.
author: misty hartman

review: I don't feel like I am being fair with this rating, but this is how I feel right now.  I don't see where it has done much for my tv viewing.  But maybe I just don't understand what it is suppose to do for me!  Need more time to see what benefits it has; for now it just wasn't worth the money I spent.
author: Sassywvmom
